ColorPicker
===========================

.. automodule:: wblenderstylewidget.components.widgets.button
   :members: ColorPicker
   :exclude-members: innerSetting, enterEvent, leaveEvent, mousePressEvent, mouseReleaseEvent
   :undoc-members: innerSetting
   :show-inheritance:

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - ATTRIBUTES
     - type
     - Description
   * - ``selected_color_name``
     - string
     - The name of the currently selected color. This is used to set the button's background color.
   * - ``show_text``
     - string
     - Indicates whether the button should display the name of the selected color as text.

.. warning::
    ``selected_color_name`` functionality may be revised in the future.
